msbt.message: Welcome to Nook Stop, a multimedia terminal from Nook Inc.
You must be registered as a resident to use this service.
Only registered residents of can use this terminal.
Please select from the following services:
Redeem Nook Miles
Nook Shopping

This is an add-on construction permit for the Island Designer app.The price is . Would you like to redeem miles for this permit?
Redeem
No
Your redemption request has been processed. Your selection will be mailed to your home.
Would you like to make another selection?
Yes
No
System Notification:Your account is now registered for miles-redemption services.We hope you continue to enjoy the many benefits of the Nook Mileage Program. Thank you.

System Notification:Congratulations on upgrading to the Nook Miles+ program!With this upgrade, you'll have access to even more redemption options.We hope you continue to enjoy the many benefits of the Nook Mileage Program. Thank you.
Nook Miles+ members can get special travel tickets called Nook Miles Tickets. Please stop by the counter at the airport for details.
You cannot receive your redemption item because your pockets are full.Please organize your belongings, and try again later.
Now generating <10_8 arg="55" />
Your Nook Miles Ticket has been printed.Please bring it with you to the Airport when you want to redeem it.
Your Bell voucher has been printed.Please take it to Nook's Cranny when you want to redeem it for Bells.
The DIY recipe is .You already have this recipe. Are you sure you want to redeem your miles for it?
Redeem
No
The DIY recipe is . Do you want to redeem your miles for it?
Redeem
No
Your DIY recipe has been issued.
A special app must be installed on your NookPhone before you can redeem DIY recipes.Please take part in the DIY workshop in Resident Services to obtain this app.
Your order has been printed.
Your order has been processed.<10_4 /> Please place your NookPhone near the terminal to receive the app data.
Your app has been updated. Thank you for using the Nook Stop.
The recipe data is now stored in your app. Thanks for using the Nook Stop.

Nook Shopping Notification:Thank you for using Nook Shopping. You have placed 100 orders through this service. To mark this occasion, we're giving you the Nook Shopping app so you can shop anytime, anywhere. Please place your NookPhone near the terminal to begin app installation.
The app has been installed. We hope you continue to enjoy using the Nook Shopping service.
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles.
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (Day 1: 50 bonus miles)
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (2 days in a row: 80 bonus miles)
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (3 days in a row: 100 bonus miles)
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (4 days in a row: 150 bonus miles)
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (5 days in a row: 200 bonus miles)
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (6 days in a row: 250 bonus miles)
Once per day, accessing the Nook Stop will award you bonus daily miles. (7+ days in a row: 300 bonus miles)
A notice from the Nook Mileage Program:
A New Year's greeting from the Nook Mileage Program:
We're sorry that the Nook Stop was unavailable all day yesterday due to construction on Resident Services.
Happy New Year!We're sorry that the Nook Stop was unavailable all day yesterday due to Resident Services' holiday closure.
To make up for that, we're giving any customers who access the Nook Stop today 500 miles.
Also, regardless of your access history, your daily access bonus will be set at 7+ days tomorrow.
We hope you'll continue to use this Nook Stop and the Nook Mileage Program in the future.
We hope you'll continue to use this Nook Stop and the Nook Mileage Program in the new year.
With this option, you can invite animals to the campsite using an Animal Crossing character's amiibo.
Do you want to use an amiibo to invite an animal to the campsite?
Yes, I do!
No
There is a guest currently visiting the campsite.If you invite a camper with amiibo, the current guest will leave.
We hope to see you again soon!
Thank you for your patronage.
Please prepare the amiibo for the animal you want to invite to the campsite.
That's 's amiibo! Would you like to invite to the campsite?
Yes!
Never mind.
That's the amiibo for Timmy and Tommy! Which one would you like to invite to the campsite?
Timmy.
Tommy.
Never mind.
It seems we're getting an answering- machine message
That's 's amiibo! But already at the campsite.
It seems you can't chat with right now.
That's the Villager amiibo!<10_4 /> The Villager can't come to the campsite.
Canceled reading amiibo. Do you wish to stop using this service?
Stop.
Read again.
That's 's amiibo! Would you like to invite to the campsite?
Yes!
Never mind.
It seems you can't chat with right now.
You can only invite one camper to the campsite per day. Please come back again tomorrow.
You can't use amiibo while you have company on the island.Please try again later after you are done using networked play.
You can't use amiibo when the gate in the airport is open for visitors.Please try again when the gate in the airport is closed.
You can't read amiibo while network communications are active.Please shut down communications from the airport counter, and then try again.
You can't use amiibo when Airplane Mode is set to ON.Please go to Quick Settings (Hold ) and change it to OFF. Then use your amiibo again.
This amiibo is not supported. Please use an Animal Crossing character's amiibo.
That'snot an amiibo. Please use an Animal Crossing character's amiibo.
The controller you are using can't read amiibo.Please use a different controller.Please note that the Pro Controller can't read amiibo while connected to the system via wired connection.
Failed to read amiibo.
Would you like to try again?
Read again.
Stop.
Do you want to use a different amiibo to invite someone else to the campsite?
Yes, I do!
No
System NotificationYou can now order posters of models you've called to Photopia via Special Goods in Nook Shopping. We hope you continue to enjoy using Nook Shopping.
